Cleverus is a brand that specializes in providing a wide range of smart home products and solutions. They offer a variety of products including smart thermostats, smart locks, smart cameras, smart plugs and more. All of these products are designed to make your home more convenient and secure, while also helping you save energy and money.

One of the standout features of Cleverus is their user-friendly app, which allows you to control all of your smart home devices from one central location. This app is available for both iOS and Android devices, and it allows you to easily monitor and control your devices from anywhere, at any time.

Cleverus is also known for their commitment to customer satisfaction, and they offer a wide range of support options to help you get the most out of your smart home products. Whether you have a question about setting up a device or need help troubleshooting an issue, Cleverus has a team of experts available to assist you.

Another benefit of choosing Cleverus is their competitive pricing. They offer a wide range of products at different price points, making it easy to find a smart home solution that fits your budget. Additionally, many of their products are eligible for rebates and other incentives, which can help you save even more money.
